projects.orig_content:
Our favorite project in recent memory - a shoppable video series that allowed users to select their favorite products as they appeared in the episode. About forty products appeared in sync with each episode and filled a tile grid with options to share and shop each product. Episodes were released every two days leading up to a public style event with great success!

something

projects.name: targets-falling-for-you-campaign

[gallery ids="210,211,212,213,214"]

We worked with Olson to develop the front-end of this Facebook application that allowed users to choose a visual style and soundtrack for a summer-themed movie featuring captions and photos. Users could select Facebook photos and write their own captions, then compile the video to share with their friends.
projects.title: Coors Light Iced-T Summer Remix
projects.name: coors-light-iced-t-summer-remix
projects.content: We worked with Olson to develop the front-end of this Facebook application that allowed users to choose a visual style and soundtrack for a summer-themed movie featuring captions and photos. Users could select Facebook photos and write their own captions, then compile the video to share with their friends.

projects.orig_content: Fiveleft expanded the Gift Finder tools first used in Kohl's 2008 Holiday campaign to expand across multiple departments for the Back to School promotions in the Summer of 2009.
projects.title: The More You Know, The More You Kohl's
projects.name: kohls-back-to-school-2009
projects.content: Fiveleft expanded the Gift Finder tools first used in Kohl's 2008 Holiday campaign to expand across multiple departments for the Back to School promotions in the Summer of 2009.

projects.orig_content: To showcase a new line of Dana Buchman clothing for the Spring season, we developed a site for Kohl's to shop the clothing line by look. The site features large images to highlight a selected look and direct shoppers to the new products.
projects.title: Dana Buchman Showcase
projects.name: dana-buchman-showcase
projects.content: To showcase a new line of Dana Buchman clothing for the Spring season, we developed a site for Kohl's to shop the clothing line by look. The site features large images to highlight a selected look and direct shoppers to the new products.

projects.orig_content: We helped OLSON build the client-facing templates for the 2010 and 2011 version of the HGTV Target Marketplace site. The template system allows the client to rollout unlimited iterations of the site for seasonal campaigns.
projects.title: HGTV/Target Marketplace
projects.name: hgtvtarget-marketplace
projects.content: We helped OLSON build the client-facing templates for the 2010 and 2011 version of the HGTV Target Marketplace site. The template system allows the client to rollout unlimited iterations of the site for seasonal campaigns.

McDonalds launched a massive platform to deliver campaigns that coincide with its Happy Meal promotions. Fiveleft worked with a large team from Arc Worldwide and other contractors to develop the platform, with the primary responsibility of developing the Shrek Adventure as the inaugural campaign for the platform.
projects.title: McDonalds Shrek's Treketh Campaign
projects.name: mcdonalds-akp-shrek

about.title: About
about.name: about

background.content:
Fiveleft was founded in Seattle in 2006 by Charles Krueger, an interactive developer and graphic designer.

Prior to moving to Seattle in the summer of 2006, Charles graduated from the art program at the University of Wisconsin in 2003, then worked for three years as a Flash developer and designer at Tank Design. At Tank – an award-winning design shop in Boston – Charles worked on projects for FedEx, Puma, Sony, Fidelity, Siemens USA, MIT, and Boston Museum of Fine Arts.

Since its formation, Fiveleft has worked with interactive agencies on campaigns for McDonald’s, Microsoft, T-Mobile, and the Seattle Supersonics (R.I.P). Fiveleft also worked as the primary Flash developer for Kohl’s Back to School and Holiday campaigns in 2008 and 2009, and created a Kohl’s Gift Shop application that was used extensively for major shopping campaigns throughout the past two years.

In between work for larger companies, Fiveleft has also prided itself on forming relationships with smaller clients and producing great identities and websites for boutique shops and businesses.
background.title: Background
background.name: background

philosophy.content:
At Fiveleft, our mission is to create visually compelling interactive experiences.

We believe a compelling interactive experience weighs heavily on the visual aesthetic and the “feel” of the experience. In our work, we try to adhere to the highest standards of design throughout the execution of the development. We are passionate about design and interactive quality.
philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.name: philosophy

new-business.content: Fiveleft enjoys relationships with clients and agencies of all sizes. Drop a note if you would like to discuss a project or an opportunity, even in the early stages of its development. Email studio@fiveleft.com or call 206.310.7873 for more information.
new-business.title: New Business
new-business.name: new-business
